metadata.synopsis: The party mindflayer has begun casting Karsus' compulsion on the crown. The spell will take a turn to complete, and as such the mindflayer needs to be protected by other players.This AD will play on the player who takes a turn after the mindflayer starts the spellcast.

0.speaker: The Emperor
0.text: This is it - protect your illithid ally while they cast the spell!
0.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

1.speaker: Orpheus
1.text: This is it - protect your illithid ally while they cast the spell!
1.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

2.speaker: Player
2.text: This is it - keep the enemy away until the brain is completely subdued!
2.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it
